Judul: Lateral Alternating Donor/Acceptor Multilayered Junction forOrganic Solar Cells
Abstrak: Blended junctions are indispensable for organicsolar cells; however, the fabrication of electron and holetransport routes in blended cells remains quite challenging.Herein, a lateral alternating multilayered junction using ahigh-mobility organic semiconductor is proposed anddemonstrated. A total of 93% of the photogenerated electronsand holes are laterally collected over a long distance (0.14mm). The exciton-collection efficiency reaches 75% in alateral alternating multilayered junction with a layer thicknessof 10 nm. A lateral organic alternating multilayered junctionthat completely collects both excitons and carriers can be analternative blended junction for organic solar cells
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Thidarat Kunawong,Masaki Hirota,Thidarat Kunawong,Yusuke Shinmura,Masahiro Abe,Yuichi Sadamitsu,Aye Masahiro HiramotoHiroyoshi Naito,MMasanobu Izaki,Seiichiro Izawa,yint Moh,
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
Kata Kunci: lateral alternating multilayered junctions, high mobilities, millimeter ranges, alternative blended junctions,organic solar cells, exciton collection efficiency
